content: Click the 3-bar menu icon, upper right corner, New Account, Calendar, On the network, enter the icloud account, and https://caldav.icloud.com/ for the Location. Enter an app-specific password (generated at icloud) when asked for a password.
creator: sfhowes

content: delete
creator: PavelkoT

content:
Hello bryan68,

Thanks for posting in the community forum.

Please try the following: If it is running, close Thunderbird. Next, delete the msf file in the Mail folder, which is a few levels below the Thunderbird program folder. After that, start Thunderbird and check if the same symptoms appear. (If you delete the msf file, nothing will be displayed immediately after startup, but the email contents should appear after a few minutes.)

I hope that solves the problem.
creator: Hisayuki.Fukuda

content: See https://www.thunderbird.net/donate/help/ for help or changes with donations. The page says there is a backlog in donor inquires at moment.
creator: James

content:
Hello Brian,

Thanks for posting in the community forum.

My guess is that you've never successfully received a single email from that Gmail account in Thunderbird? Maybe the problem is not with Thunderbird, but with the Gmail settings. You can try logging in to Gmail and checking if POP access is enabled in the settings.

I hope that solves the problem.
creator: Hisayuki.Fukuda

content: I think the junk controls are stored in training.dat.

content:
Informazioni utili da fornire nelle richieste al forum:

  1. Versione di Thunderbird
  2. Versione del sistema operativo
  3. Provider delle caselle email (Gmail, Libero, Hotmail, etc.)
  4. Tipologia di account (POP3, IMAP)
  5. Estensioni installate
  6. Messaggi di errore che vengono visualizzati durante l'utilizzo di Thunderbird
  7. Software di sicurezza eventualmente presenti (Antivirus e simili)
creator: @next
